item.title: Keychain2Pass - Migrate Your OSX Keychain To Pass
item.description: In my previous blog post wrote about a better GPG keychain. I’m using a yubikey to encrypt/decrypt documents. Why not using the yubikey key for my passwords too? So i decided to store my passwords no more in my OSX keychain. I wanted to switch from OSX keychain to pass. It turns out that the manual migration from the OSX keychain to pass is really time consuming. I was to lazy to it manually.
